VEGAN SPINACH ARTICHOKE PASTA BAKE

FULL RECIPE: https://www.veganricha.com/vegan-spinach-artichoke-pasta-bake-recipe/

SUBSCRIBE HERE: https://www.youtube.com/veganricharecipes?sub_confirmation=1

You will love this delicious creamy Vegan Spinach and Artichoke Pasta Bake recipe. It’s like having spinach and artichoke dip, but for dinner! Dairy-free, plant-based & so easy to make. I use tofu for the creamy base in this one. To make it without soy, just use my nut based spinach artichoke dip.

It’s fresh yet oh so creamy, fancy yet very easy to make any day of the week, and as tasty as can be. It’s basically the same concept as a restaurant-style spinach & artichoke dip but served as a pasta bake. I use tofu for the creamy base in this one. To make it without soy, just use my nut based spinach artichoke dip. Thin it a bit with non dairy milk, mix in the pasta and done.

recipeIngredient: 8 oz pasta (, such as shells, penne or ziti)
5 oz spinach ((thawed if frozen, finely chopped if fresh))
14 oz can of artichoke hearts drained and chopped
7 oz firm tofu or silken tofu
1 1/4  cup non dairy milk such as almond, oat, or soy
1/2 tsp dried italian herbs such as oregano, (thyme, rosemary)

recipeInstructions.text: Cook the pasta according to instruction and set aside. thaw the spinach if using frozen. Chop the artichoke hearts.
recipeInstructions.name: Cook the pasta according to instruction and set aside. thaw the spinach if using frozen. Chop the artichoke hearts.

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a skillet over medium heat. Add minced onions, garlic and pinch of salt and cook until golden.
recipeInstructions.name: Heat oil in a skillet over medium heat. Add minced onions, garlic and pinch of salt and cook until golden.

recipeInstructions.text: Transfer them to a blender with the rest of the sauce ingredients and blend everything until smooth. Taste and adjust flavor(salt, tang, cheesyness).
recipeInstructions.name: Transfer them to a blender with the rest of the sauce ingredients and blend everything until smooth. Taste and adjust flavor(salt, tang, cheesyness).

recipeInstructions.text: Add some olive oil to a baking dish. Add the cooked pasta, spinach, chopped artichokes and the blended sauce. Toss to mix well. Rinse out the blender with 2 tbsp water and add.
recipeInstructions.name: Add some olive oil to a baking dish. Add the cooked pasta, spinach, chopped artichokes and the blended sauce. Toss to mix well. Rinse out the blender with 2 tbsp water and add.

recipeInstructions.text: Sprinkle the pasta with breadcrumbs, pepper flakes, herbs, and a little salt and optional vegan parm. For the perfect brown topping, spray or drizzle with some olive oil.
recipeInstructions.name: Sprinkle the pasta with breadcrumbs, pepper flakes, herbs, and a little salt and optional vegan parm. For the perfect brown topping, spray or drizzle with some olive oil.

recipeInstructions.text: Bake the pasta at 400 F (205 C) for 22 mins. Then broil for a minute or so to brown the topping.
recipeInstructions.name: Bake the pasta at 400 F (205 C) for 22 mins. Then broil for a minute or so to brown the topping.

recipeInstructions.text: Remove the dish from the oven, and serve. Store: Cool completely and refrigerate for upto 3 days.
